entry.title: Morning Dew
entry.summary:
Author: Samandiriel (kyra516)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,291Chapters: 6/10Kudos: 100

Summary: Stiles had always been a bit of an odd bunny compared to his peers. He had this sense of adventure and the need to explore! His father said he got most of it from his late mother. His father also called it recklessness and lack of self-preservation. Most of the time, Stiles just dismissed his father as being plain wrong.Today however? Today he reckoned his father was completely and truly right in his judgement. Because today, Stiles had made the most reckless and stupid decision of his life. You see, Stiles had the brilliant idea of venturing into wolf lands to do some gathering, and so here he was, on the other side of the river, in the unknown lands that no bunny before him had dared to venture into. What could possibly go wrong?It was all Jackson's fault anyway.  ---The story is finished and will be fully published either by me, or in case of my death, by my friend. You will not be left hanging. ---

entry.title: Ghost in the Machine
entry.summary:
Author: pixieblade

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,345Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 34

Summary: There was a boy sitting on the bleachers.To be honest, Derek wouldn’t have given him the time of day normally, but there were a few things that struck him as odd. Firstly, there was still a good thirty minutes before school let out. Secondly, the boy was silently staring out towards the preserve with a pensive expression. Thirdly, he had no scent, and his heartbeat was non-existent.Okay, maybe he should have led with that, but the point was, there was a boy sitting on the bleachers, and Derek seemed to be the only one who could see him.

entry.title: Found You Again
entry.summary:
Author: PheonixInk

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 737Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 13

Summary: Years after their last goodbye, Stiles never expected to see Derek Hale again. But fate or maybe something more has other plans. When Stiles stumbles into Derek’s path after a supernatural case brings them back to the same place, old wounds resurface, old flames reignite, and the love they thought they lost refuses to stay buried.

entry.summary:
Author: evvrythingisawesome

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 62,375Chapters: 46/54Kudos: 59

entry.title: Iron Gilded Void
entry.summary:
Author: DaisyBeats

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,999Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 154

Summary: Things fall apart for Stiles in Beacon Hills and he and the Hale men in his life end up with his uncles in New York City. "Guys, it's fine," Stiles said, stepping forward. "Stiles, it’s not fine!" Derek snapped, not taking his eyes off James. "Do you fucking know who that is?!" Stiles blinked at him, then at Peter, whose entire body was coiled so tightly he looked ready to launch himself at James at any second. With a sigh, Stiles rubbed his face. “Yes. That’s Uncle James.”

entry.title: Derek's Most Prized Possession
entry.summary:
Author: SterekLoverForEver

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,916Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 81

Summary: That dumb bitch. A stupid fucking witch. She just had to come to Beacon Hills after things had been quiet.Luring the pack out thinking it was Stiles as if he’d asked the pack to meet at the preserve in the middle of the night. The pack stands, surrounding the witch in a circle. She looks at the pack before picking her victim. She runs to attack Stiles but Derek jumps in front of him at the last second.“Derek! NO!” Stiles yells but it’s too late. The witch looks stunned before grinning; she cackles before punching Derek in the chest. A bolt of lightning shoots out of her hands and into Derek. He slumps to the floor growling. The pack runs to their alpha to stop the witch from doing more harm.She stands over Derek. “You’ll kill your mate and your pack, you won’t be able to control the chaos inside. Too bad I won’t be here to see it.” She shrugs her shoulders before snapping her fingers and disappearing. The pack looks around to see if they can find her, when they turn up blank they turn back to Derek

entry.title: Wolfbane Whiskey: Isabelle’s Reckless Fun
entry.summary:
Author: WolfFeller

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 809Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 3

Summary: The pack gathers at a lively bar for a night of drinking, dancing, and letting loose. Special wolfbane-infused whiskey allows the supernatural members to actually feel a buzz, while humans are strictly warned to avoid it. Isabelle, ever the rebellious spirit, gets her hands on the strong drink and ends up joyfully twirling on the dance floor, drawing attention from more than just her packmates.Peter watches his beta closely, growing increasingly possessive as she dances without a care in the world. Meanwhile, Stiles and Derek’s relationship is on full display, with Stiles reveling in being affectionate, much to Derek’s reluctant amusement. The pack enjoys the chaos, knowing that Peter’s patience is wearing thin.As Isabelle continues to push her limits, Peter decides enough is enough, leading to a dramatic moment that leaves the entire pack entertained—and Isabelle realizing she may have gone a little too far.

entry.title: Game of Pawns
entry.summary:
Author: Mikaelsonbich25

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,709Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 2

Summary: The supernatural have always been around since many can remember. Some operate in the shadows while others are more public.Humans often avoid meddling in the dark side of this world, but there are some pawns that were forced into it.Two of these human pawns happen to be Steve Rogers and Peter Parker.

entry.title: Waiting In The Wings
entry.summary:
Author: stereksterek

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,493Chapters: 3/7Kudos: 93

Summary: Melissa folded her arms and stared at Stiles, “I’m still having a hard time believing that Derek Hale, of all people, is your boyfriend now.”“Yep! Derek’s my boyfriend! We’re totally rocking the whole relationship thing. I mean, we’re no Scott and Allison when it comes to PDA, but we’re both very affectionate behind closed doors. It’s kind of hilarious actually, because some people think that Derek doesn’t even like me when we’re in public, just because he growls or glares at me from time to time. But we’re just a misunderstood couple, y’know… Kind of like other star-crossed lovers out there. We’re basically this generation’s Romeo and… Miguel.”Melissa was grinning so wide that her face almost hurt. Stiles had wildly overcompensated, and now she knew he was lying.“If you and Derek are boyfriends, you won’t have a problem inviting him over for dinner then.”Stiles malfunctioned for a full second before squawking like a dying bird, “Dinner?!”
